name: Wisor Telecom
overview: As of September 30, 2008, Wisor Telecom Corporation was acquired by Synchronoss Technologies, Inc. Wisor Telecom Corporation provides operational support system software solutions and professional services. Its products and services enhance and streamline the order management, provisioning, service inventory, optimization, service management, and quality assurance systems and processes used by carriers. The companyâ€™s professional services include custom software development, integration, training, test case design and support, process and technology architecture consulting, configuration and implementation, database conversion and migration, requirements assessment, and auditing and analytical. Wisor Telecom Corporation also designs, develops, markets, and supports software products and software-based services to wireline, VoIP, and wireless telecommunications providers. The company was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Gaithersburg, Maryland.
